name: Space Pong HD is a free ping pong game for two that is staged in space, the game about aliens, multiplayer, Arkanoid ping pong; you can play air hockey or tennis for free
name_original: Space Pong HD is a free ping pong game for two that is staged in space, the game about aliens, multiplayer, Arkanoid ping pong; you can play air hockey or tennis for free
description:
Space Pong HD is the new incarnation of the classic Ping Pong. Become a Space Pong fighter! Defeat the alien invaders and save the universe!

- 3 chapters with 10 levels each
- 3 super-villains
- Nice graphics and sound design
